column4: Could someone tell me of a good antivirus package i could use with ubuntu.. one which will detect and disinfect boot sector virii?
its a virus from back in 1996, i was hoping it would be easy to fix
I have a program called S-Prot which was supposed to be able to disinfect this ivrus
virus*
but it didn't work
if you need to rewrite the partition table see teskdisk
I see it right here in my package manager list
I have used testdisk before, and swear by it
saved gigs of data for a client of mine...:)
just run teskdisk and choose the 'scan' option
I'm running a live ubuntu CD right now
can I pm you?
hey sorry
so register...
Hey so i'm using this testdisk program from the ubuntu live cd
choose scan
hmm.. i dont see that in the main options here
the only disk that comes up is /dev/hdc
sorry what? is 'scan' a command?
hey so what is the disk you have?
got it, thanks.. how does it work?
no problem with being discreet
